info.name: Paysis
info.description:
## Paysis - example of a simple payment system

###### created by Dusty Dump

###### for PASV online IT academy (course QA Manual)

### Description

The following is a collection of API calls that are based on a public API server ( [Paysis](https://github.com/bormando/paysis) ) that imitates a common payment service. Paysis is a Web API that provides **CRUD** (**C**reate, **R**ead, **U**pdate, **D**elete) functionalities and features an authentication mechanism that utilizes Bearer Tokens. The API is free of bugs and does not contain pre-loaded data. Additionally, the server resets itself whenever it falls into sleep mode, and all data can be cleared using a `Delete Config` request.

Further information regarding the available API calls is provided below. Each call is accompanied by both successful and unsuccessful examples.

It is important to highlight that this project was designed for educational purposes only, and

has been made public to facilitate multi-access by students.

### Story

As an owner, you may log in using an admin role to create users and transactions associated with these users. Furthermore, minor adjustments can be made to the server configuration.
